Title: Carrier enables 2-week delivery of R454B
Summary: USA: With the US continuing to suffer shortages of lower GWP refrigerant R454B, Carrier has announced that it is now fulfilling R454B refrigerant orders within two weeks from time of order.

Title: Daikin Europe opens €140m R&D centre
Summary: BELGIUM: After two and a half years of construction, Daikin’s €140m EMEA Development Centre (EDC) is now operational.

Title: Modine opens Chennai factory
Summary: USA: Modine has officially opened its new 100,000ft2 factory in Chennai, India, to meet accelerated demand for data centre cooling across the APAC region.

Title: Vertiv buys data rack and cabinet company
Summary: UK/USA: Vertiv Holdings has successfully completed the $200m acquisition of Great Lakes Data Racks & Cabinets, a leading manufacturer of innovative data rack enclosures and integrated infrastructure solutions.

Title: £250 promo on Panasonic Mini VRF
Summary: UK: Panasonic Heating and Cooling Solutions has introduced a new installer incentive to promote its ECOi Mini VRF outdoor units.

Title: Wolseley revamps Climate Centre branches
Summary: UK: Pipe Centre and Climate Centre says it has made a significant investment in five key UK branches in the last few months.

Title: BESA backs cooling for UK buildings
Summary: UK: The Building Engineering Services Association (BESA) is calling for urgent action to tackle overheating in buildings, as the UK experiences rising temperatures and heat-related deaths.

Title: CTC adds high capacity R290 ATW heat pump
Summary: SWEDEN: CTC has announced the launch of the EcoAir 720M, the highest-capacity unit in its EcoAir 700M range of modulating air-to-water heat pumps.
